channel.title: Development on Hugo Relearn Theme
channel.description: Recent content in Development on Hugo Relearn Theme

item.title: Screenshots
item.description: Sometimes screenshots need to be redone. This page explains how to create the different screenshots, tools and settings Common Creation: Use English translation Empty search Remove history checkmarks but leave it on the page thats used for the screenshot After resize of the page into the required resolution, reload the page to have all scrollbars in default loading position Demo Screenshot Content: A meaningful full-screen screenshot of an interesting page.
